name: Faceless Darkness
description:
In Faceless Darkness you're a lost astronaut that haves to salvage parts to repair his ship in a unknown planet. Beware of the darkness that lurks the facility...

Instructions:

WASD / Arrows - Movement

Mouse - Look around

E - To interact with notes / savaged parts

V - Use echolocator to see the objects around you in the darkness

Hold R - Reload your echolocator

Made by Simon Esteban Cardona / Miguel Ángel Hoyos for the DJAM 2
